resources.string: GET STRONG AND \n BUILD LEAN MUSCLE"
MODIFIED ELBOW TO KNEE CRUNCH SECOND SIDE
BODYWEIGHT ARM AND LEG LIFT STRAIGHT
BODYWEIGHT ARM AND LEG LIFT STRAIGHT SECOND SIDE
DUMBBELL BICEPS CURL BENCH SECOND SIDE
BODYWEIGHT SQUAD SINGLE LEG SECOND SIDE
DUMBBELL SINGLE LEG DEADLIFT SECOND SIDE
BARBELL SPLIT SINGLE LEG SECOND SIDE
DUMBBELL ROTATING T EXTENSION SECOND SIDE
STANDING SINGLE ARM TRICEPS EXTENSION SECOND SIDE
STRETCH LYING KNEE BENT SECOND SIDE
SINGLE DUMBBELL LUNGE SIDE SECOND SIDE
STANDING SIDE SINGLE ARM SECOND SIDE

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP 1: LIE DOWN ON THE FLOOR. LIFT LEGS UNTIL LEGS ARE PERPENDICULAR WITH THE FLOOR. FULLY EXTEND YOUR ARMS ABOVE YOU AND HOLD THE DUMBBELL.

STEP 2: REACH YOUR TOES WITH YOUR HANDS. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN FOR STATING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP 1: LIE DOWN ON THE FLOOR.FULLY EXTEND YOUR ARMS ABOVE YOU AND HOLD MEDICINE BALL PERPENDICULAR. 

STEP :2 LIFT YOUR FEET AND ARMS TOWARD THE AIR. TOUCHING WITH THE MEDICINE BALL YOUR LEGS AND GOING BACK TO THE FIRST POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP 1: LIE DOWN ON THE FLOOR. HOLD THE BALL WITH YOUR HANDS. EXTEND LEGS FULLY. RAISE YOUR LEGS TOWARD YOUR UPPER BOD AND PASS THE BALL UNDER YOUR BENT LEG. 

STEP 2: AS YOU RETURN TO STARTING POSITION RACE AND BENT YOUR OTHER LEG TOWARDS YOUR UPPER BODY AND AGAIN PASS THE BALL UNDER THE BENT LEG. 

THIS IS ONE REPETITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMIN 

STEP 1: LAY DOWN ON THE FLOOR, BEND YOUR KNEES AND KEEP YOUR FEET 18-24 INCHES APART. KEEP YOUR ARMS STRAIGHT NEAR YOUR BODY. 

STEP 2: NOW CRUNCH OVER 3-4 INCHES AND TOUCH YOUR RIGHT HEEL ONCE. THAT CRUNCH BACK AND REPEAT IT. CRUNCH OVER AND TOUCH YOUR LEFT HEEL. WHILE CRUNCHING KEEP YOUR LOWER BACK ON THE FLOOR. REPEAT THIS REPEFIFION.

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP 1: LIE DOWN ON THE FLOOR. LIFT LEGS UNTIL ONE LEG IS PERPENDICULAR WITH THE FLOOR. FULLY EXTEND YOUR ARMS ABOVE YOU. 

STEP 2: REACH FOR TOES WITH YOUR HANDS. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP 1: LIE BACK ON THE FLOOR. PUT HANDS BEHIND YOUR HEAD. KNEES ARE BEND AND FEET ARE ON THE FLOOR. 

STEP 2: RAISE YOUR UPPER BODY UPWARD. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO YOUR STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP 1: LIE BACK ON THE FLOOR. PUT HANDS BEHIND YOUR HEAD. KNEES ARE BEND AND FEET ARE ON THE FLOOR. 

STEP 2: RAISE YOUR UPPER BODY UPWARD. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO YOUR STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: OBLIQUES 

STEP 1: SIT DOWN WITH YOUR FEET FLAT AND KNEES BENT. GRASP A WEIGHTED WITH BOTH HANDS. LEAN BACK SLIGHTLY AS YOU FULLY EXTEND YOUR ARMS STRAIGHT IN FRONT OF YOU. 

STEP 2: TWIST YOUR TORSO IN ONE DIRECTION. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. 

STEP 3: RETURN TO STARTING POSITION. TWIST YOUR TORSO IN THE OTHER DIRECTION. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP 1: LIE DOWN ON THE FLOOR. FEET ARE FLAT ON THE FLOOR AND KNEES ARE BENT. FULLY EXTEND YOUR ARMS KEEPING THE WEIGHTED. 

STEP 2: RAISE YOUR UPPER BODY UPWARD WHILE KEEPING YOUR LOWER BACK ON THE FLOOR. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP 1: SIT ON THE FLOR. HOLD THE DUMBBELL, LIE BACK AND RISE YOUR LEGS UNTIL YOU REACH A POSITION OF BALANCE. 

STEP 2: BEND YOUR KNEES TOWARDS YOUR UPPER BODY. AT THE SAME TIME OPEN YOUR ARMS. MOVE UPPER BODY FORWARD TO MAINTAIN POSITION OF BALANCE. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: OBLIQUES 

STEP 1: LAI DOWN ON THE FLOOR, BEND YOUR LEGS AND PUT YOUR FEET ON THE GROUND. MOVE YOUR HANDS BEHIND YOUR EARS AND PUT YOUR ELBOWS OUT. CURVE YOUR RIGHT LEG UP AND REST YOUR FOOT ON YOUR LEFT KNEE. 

STEP 2: CRUNCH FORWARDS AND LIFT IT SIDEWAYS AND TRY TO TOUCH YOUR LEFT ELBOW TO YOUR RIGHT KNEE. THAN CRUNCH BACKWARDS, NOW SWAP AND CRUNCH FORWARD AND LIFT IT SIDEWAYS AND TRY TO TOUCH YOUR RIGHT ELBOW TO YOUR LEFT KNEE. REPEAT THIS.

MUSCLE GROUP: OBLIQUES 

STEP 1: LIE ON YOUR SIDE. MAKE SURE ONE LEG IS ON TOP OF THE OTHER. POSITION THE FOREARM ON THE FLOOR PERPENDICULAR WITH YOUR BODY. 

STEP 2: USE YOUR FOREARM TO LIFT YOUR UPPER BODY OF THE GROUND. THE OTHER ARM IS PLACED ON THE SIDE OF YOUR BODY. YOUR BODY SHOULD BE STRAIGHT. ONLY YOUR FOREARM AND THE SIDE OF YOUR FOOT SHOULD BE TOUCHING THE FLOOR. HOLD THIS POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP 1: LIE DOWN ON THE FLOOR, PUT YOUR ARMS AT THE SIDES. BENT YOUR KNEES OP AND HOLD THEM STILL. 

STEP 2: QUICKLY LIFT YOUR TORSO AS YOU PULL YOUR CHEST TO YOUR KNEES. KEEP YOUR ARMS PARALLEL TO THE FLOOR.

MUSCLE GRUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS \n\nSTEP 1: LIE DOWN ON THE FLOOR. EXTEND YOUR LEGS PUT YOUR HANDS BEHIND YOUR HEAD. STEP 2: REACH YOUR TOES WITH YOUR HANDS. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE NAME: OBLIQUES 

STEP 1: LIE ON YOUR SIDE WITH YOUR BODY IN A STRAIGHT LINE AND YOUR ARMS CROSSED AGAINST YOUR CHEST. 

STEP 2: LIFT YOUR LEGS OFF THE FLOOR, MAKING SURE TO KEEP THEM TIGHTLY BOUND CONTRACTING, EVEN THOUGHT THERE ISN'T TOO MUCH MOTION INVOLVED. 

STEP 3: PAUSE, THEN SLOWLY RETURN TO THE STARTING POSITION. REPEAT AS MANY TIMES AS NEEDED THEN SWITCH SIDES.

MUSCLE GROUSZECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP 1: LIE DOWN ON THE FLOOR WITH YOUR HANDS ASIDE, AND YOUR FEET STRAIGHT. 

STEP 2: LIFT ONE LEG, BEND IT TO 90 DEGREES AND LAY IT OVER THE OTHER ONE, THAT STAYS STRAIGHT. 

STEP 3: MAINTAINING THIS POSITION START THE EXERCISE BY LIFTING THE STRAIGHT LEG UP. 

STEP 4: REPEAT THIS POSITION AS NECESSARY. SWITCH LEGS AND REPEAT.

MUSCLE: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP 1. WHILE LYING ON YOUR BACK, EXTEND YOUR LEGS AND ARMS FULLY. 

STEP 2. SLOWLY LIFT YOUR HEAD AND SHOULDERS. AS YOU CURL UPWARD, ATTEMPT TO REACH AS HIGH AS POSSIBLE WITH YOUR FINGERS. 

STEP 3. HOLD. THEN RETURN TO THE STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP 1. LIE ON YOUR BACK BEND YOUR KNEES WITH YOUR ARMS AND LEGS STRAIGHT UP IN THE AIR HOLDING A BALL IN YOUR HANDS. 

STEP 2. SLOWLY LIFT YOUR HEAD AND SHOULDERS. PLACE THE BALL ON YOUR LEGS. 

STEP 3. HOLD. THEN RETURN TO THE STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP 1: LIE ON THE FLOOR WITH YOUR HANDS CROSSED OVER YOUR CHEST. BRING YOUR KNEES TO A 90 DEGREES ANGLE TO YOUR TORSO. LEGS ARE PRESSED TOGETHER. 

STEP 2: WITH YOUR ABS CONTRACTED RAISE BOTH YOURS SHOULDERS AND PELVIS UP AS IF TRYING TO REACH THE CEILING WITH YOUR KNEES.

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP 1: PLACE THE ROLLOUT ON THE FLOOR WITH CIRCULAR WEIGHT. HOLD THE ROLL WITH SHOULDER WIDTH OVERHAND GRIP. POSITION YOUR KNEES NEAR THE ROLL. KEEP YOUR BACK ARCHED AND YOUR THIGHS STRAIGHT. 

STEP 2: ROLL OUT ON FRONT OF YOU, ALLOWING YOUR UPPER BODY TO EXTEND. STOP WHEN YOUR BACK IS STRAIGHTENED OUT. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP 1: LIE ON THE FLOOR. PLACE HANDS UNDER YOUR HIP. EXTEND LEGS FULLY. SLIGHTLY RAISE LEGS. 

STEP 2: BEND LEGS TOWARDS YOUR UPPER BODY. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP 1: LIE BACK ON THE STABILITY BALL. POSITION HANDS ON YOUR HEAD AND FEET ON THE FLOOR. 

STEP 2: RAISE YOUR UPPER BODY UPWARD WHILE KEEPING YOUR LOWER BACK ON THE STABILITY BALL. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP 1: LIE BACK ON THE STABILITY BALL. POSITION HANDS ON YOUR HEAD AND FEET ON THE FLOOR. 

STEP 2: RAISE YOUR UPPER BODY UPWARD WHILE KEEPING YOUR LOWER BACK ON THE STABILITY BALL. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: OBLIQUES 

STEP 1: SIT DOWN WITH YOUR LEGS FULLY EXTEND IN FRONT OF YOU. HOLD A MEDICINE BALL WITH BOTH HANDS. LEAN BACK UNTIL YOU ARE BALANCING ON YOUR TAILBONE. 

STEP 2: TWIST YOUR TORSO IN ONE DIRECTION. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. 

STEP 3: RETURN TO STARTING POSITION. 

STEP 4: TWIST YOUR TORSO IN THE OTHER DIRECTION. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: OBLIQUES 

STEP 1ILIE BACK ON THE STABILITY BALL. HOLD A MEDICINE BALL ABOVE YOU. 

STEP 2: TWIST YOUR TORSO IN ONE DIRECTION. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. 

STEP 3: TWIST YOUR TORSO IN OTHER DIRECTION. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: OBLIQUES 

STEP: 1: STAND STRAIGHT WITH FEET SHOULDER WIDTH APART. HOLD DUMBBELL WITH BOTH HANDS IN FRONT OF YOU. 

STEP 2: TWIST YOUR TORSO IN ONE DIRECTION. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND 

STEP 3: RETURN TO STARTING POSITION. 

STEP 4: TWIST YOUR TORSO IN THE OTHER DIRECTION. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP 1. PLACE A BOSU BALL ON THE FLOOR AND LIE WITH YOUR BACK ON IT. KEEP YOUR KNEES BENT, FEET FLAT, AND PLACE YOUR HANDS TO THE SIDES OF YOUR HEAD. 

STEP 2. LIFT YOUR HEAD AND SHOULDERS OFF THE BOSU, KEEPING YOUR FEET FLAT ON THE FLOOR THROUGHOUT THE MOVEMENT. RESIST THE URGE TO PULL YOUR HEAD UP WITH YOUR HANDS FOCUS ON USING YOUR ABDOMINAL AND CORE MUSCLES TO DO THE WORK. 

STEP 3. LOWER TO THE STARTING POSITION AND REPEAT.

MUSCLE GROUP: OBLIQUES 

STEP: 1: POSITION ONE FOREARM ON THE BENCH WITH YOUR FEET ON THE FLOOR. THE ENTIRE FOREARM SHOULD BE ON THE BENCH. MAKE SURE ONE LEG IS ON TOP OF THE OTHER. THE OTHER ARM IS PLACED ON THE SIDE OF YOUR BODY. 

STEP 2: KEEP YOUR BODY STRAIGHT. ONLY YOUR FOREARM SHOULD BE TOUCHING THE BENCH AND ONLY THE SIDE OF YOUR FOOT SHOULD BE TOUCHING THE FLOOR. HOLD THIS POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP: 1: LIE BACK ON THE DECLINE BENCH. HOLD MEDICINE BALL IN FRONT OF YOUR CHEST. 

STEP 2: RAISE YOUR UPPER BODY UPWARD. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE: OBLIQUES 

STEP: 1: LIE BACK ON THE DECLINE BENCH. HOLD MEDICINE BALL WITH BOTH HANDS. 

STEP 2: RAISE YOUR UPPER BODY UPWARD AND TOWARDS THE RIGHT. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND 

STEP 3: RETURN TO STARTING POSITION. 

STEP 4: RAISE YOUR UPPER BODY UPWARD AND TOWARDS THE LEFT. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND RETURN STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP 1: SIT ON THE SIDE OF THE BENCH. HOLD ONTO THE SIDE OF THE BENCH WITH BOTH HANDS AT SHOULDER WIDTH. LIE BACK AND RAISE YOUR LEGS UNTIL YOU REACH A POSITION OF BALANCE. 

 STEP 2: BEND YOUR KNEES TOWARDS YOUR UPPER BODY. AT THE SAME TIME, MOVE UPPER BODY FORWARD TO MAINTAIN POSITION OF BALANCE. HOLD FOR NONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP 1: SIT ON THE SIDE OF THE BENCH. HOLD ONTO THE SIDE OF THE BENCH WITH BOTH HANDS AT SHOULDER WIDTH. LIE BACK AND RAISE YOUR LEGS UNTIL YOU REACH A POSITION OF BALANCE. 

STEP 2: BEND YOUR KNEES TOWARDS YOUR UPPER BODY. AT THE SAME TIME, MOVE UPPER BODY FORWARD TO MAINTAIN POSITION OF BALANCE. HOLD FOR NONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP 1: PLACE BARBELL ON THE FLOOR WITH CIRCULAR WEIGHTS. HOLD BARBELL WITH SHOULDER WITH OVERHAND GRIP. POSITION YOUR KNEES NEAR THE BARBELL. KEEP YOUR BACK ARCHED AND YOUR THINGS STRAIGHT. 

STEP 2: ROLL THE BARBELL OUT IN FRONT OF YOU, ALLOWING YOUR UPPER BODY TO EXTEND. STOP WHEN YOUR BACK IS STRAIGHTENED OUT. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP 1: LIE ON THE FLOOR WITH LEGS EXTENDED STRAIGHT, AND HOLD ON TO THE TOP OF THE FLOOR. 

STEP 2: RAISE YOUR LEGS STRAIGHT UP, SLIGHTLY LIFTING YOUR LOWER BACK OFF THE FLOOR. 

STEP 3: HOLD FOR A FEE SECONDS, THEN LOWER YOUR LEGS BACK DOWN TO THE START POSITION. KEEP YOUR LEGS STRAIGHT THROUGHOUT THE MOTION.

MUSCLE GROUP: OBLIQUES 

STEP 1: LIE DOWN ON THE FLOOR. LIFT LEGS UNTIL THIGHS ARE PERPENDICULAR WITH THE GROUND. BEND YOUR KNEES. FULLY EXTEND YOUR ARMS TO YOUR SIDES. 

STEP: 2: WHILE TWISTING THE UPPER BODY, LOWER YOUR LEGS TO ONE SIDE. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. 

STEP: 3: RETURN TO STARTING POSITION 

STEP 4: WHILE TWISTING THE UPPER BODY, LOWER YOUR TO THE OTHER SIDE. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: OBLIQUES 

STEP 1: LIE DOWN ON THE FLOOR. LIFT LEGS UNTIL THIGHS ARE PERPENDICULAR WITH THE GROUND. KEEP LEGS STRAIGHT. FULLY EXTEND YOUR ARMS TO YOUR SIDES. 

STEP: 2: WHILE TWISTING THE UPPER BODY, LOWER YOUR LEGS TO ONE SIDE. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. 

STEP: 3: RETURN TO STARTING POSITION 

STEP 4: WHILE TWISTING THE UPPER BODY, LOWER YOUR TO THE OTHER SIDE. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP 1: LIE DOWN ON THE FLOOR. LIFT LEGS UNTIL UNTIL LEGS ARE PERPENDICULAR WITH THE FLOOR. FULLY EXTEND YOUR ARMS ABOVE YOU. 

STEP 2: REACH FOR YOUR TOES WITH YOUR HAND. MOVE TO THE SIDE AFTER EVERY TOUCHING AND COME RETURN TO STARTING POSITION AT THE MIDDLE.

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP 1: LIE DOWN ON THE FLOOR. PLACE HANDS NEXT TO YOUR SIDES. EXTEND LEGS FULLY AND SLIGHTLY ELEVATED. WHILE KEEPING LEGS STRAIGHT, RAISE ONE LEG UP 

STEP 2: AS YOU LOWER LEG, RAISE THE OTHER LEG UP THIS IS ONE REPETITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: OBLIQUES 

STEP 1: LIE DOWN ON THE FLOOR. LIFT LEGS SO THAT YOUR THIGHS ARE PERPENDICULAR WITH THE GROUND. PUT HANDS BEHIND YOUR HEAD. 

STEP 2: MOVE LEFT ELBOW AND RIGHT LEG TOWARD THE BODY UNTIL THEY TOUCH 

STEP 3: MOVE LEFT ELBOW AND RIGHT LEG BACK TO STARTING POSITION. AT THE SAME TIME, MOVE RIGHT ELBOW AND LEFT LEG TOWARD THE BODY UNTIL THEY TOUCH. THIS IS ONE REPETITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP 1: LIE DOWN ON THE FLOOR. LIFT LEGS UNTIL LEGS ARE PERPENDICULAR WITH THE FLOOR. FULLY EXTEND YOUR ARMS ABOVE YOU. 

STEP 2: REACH FOR YOUR TOES WITH YOUR HANDS. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP: 1: LIE DOWN ON THE FLAT BENCH. PLACE HANDS ON THE BENCH. EXTEND LEGS FULLY. 

STEP 2: RALSE AND BEND LEGS TOWARDS YOUR UPPER BODY. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: OBLIQUES 

STEP 1: LIE DOWN ON THE FLOOR. LIFT LEGS UNTIL THIGHS ARE PERPENDICULAR WITH THE GROUND. KEEP LEGS BENT AND KEEP THE MEDICINE BALL BETWEEN YOUR KNEES. MOVE LEGS TO SIDE. 

STEP 2: WHILE KEEPING THE UPPER BODY STILL, LOWER YOUR LEGS TO THE OTHER SIDE SIDE. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND AND RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP: 1: LIE DOWN ON THE FLOOR. HOLD MEDICINE BALL OVERHEAD WITH ARMS FULLY EXTENDED. KEEP KNEES BENT AND FEET FLAT ON FLOOR. 

STEP 2: RAISE YOUR UPPER BODY UPWARD WHILE KEEPING YOUR LOWER BACK ON THE FLOOR. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: OBLIQUES 

STEP 1: LIE DOWN ON THE FLOOR. PLACE HANDS NEXT TO YOUR SIDES. EXTEND LEGS FULLY AND SLIGHTLY ELEVATED. WHILE, KEEPING LEGS STRAIGHT, RAISE ONE LEG HIGHER THEN THE OTHER. 

STEP 2: EXTEND BOTH LEGS WIDE AND OUTWARD. 

STEP 3: AS YOUR LOWER LEG, RAISE THE OTHER LEG UP. 

STEP 4: EXTEND BOTH LEGS WIDE AND OUTWARD.

MUSCLE GROUP: LOWER BACK 

STEP 1: LIE PRONE ON THE FLOOR. FULLY EXTEND YOUR ARMS IN FRONT OF YOU. 

STEP 2: RAISE YOUR LEGS AND UPPER BODY TOWARDS THE CEILING. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: LOWER BACK 

STEP 1: LIE PRONE ON THE FLOOR. FULLY EXTEND YOUR ARMS IN FRONT OF YOU. 

STEP 2: RAISE LEFT LEG AND RIGHT ARM TOWARDS THE CEILING. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. 

STEP 3: RETURN TO STARTING POSITION. 

STEP 4: RAISE RIGHT LEG AND LEFT ARM TOWARDS THE CEILING. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION,

MUSCLE GROUP: LATISSIMUS DORSI 

STEP 1: BEND YOUR KNEES SLIGHTLY. KEEP BACK BENT AND STRAIGHT. HOLD BARBELL UNDER YOU WITH SHOULDER WIDTH UNDERHAND GRIP. 

STEP 2: RAISE THE BARBELL VERTICALLY TOWARDS YOUR CHEST. REFRAIN FROM FLARING YOUR ELBOWS OUT. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: LOWER BACK 

STEP 1: LIE PRONE ON THE FLOOR. KEEP YOUR ARMS BEHIND OF YOU HEAD. 

STEP 2: RAISE YOUR LEGS AND UPPER BODY TOWARDS THE CEILING. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP 1: KNEEL DOWN AND PLACE YOUR HANDS ON THE FLOOR. RAISE YOUR RIGHT ARM AND LEFT LEG UP INTO THE AIR. 

STEP 2: BRING YOUR ARM AND LEG OUTWARD. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS 

STEP 1: KEEP YOUR LEGS DOWN AND PLACE YOUR HANDS ON THE FLOOR. RAISE YOUR RIGHT ARM AND LEFT LEG UP INTO THE AIR. 

STEP 2: BRING YOUR ARM AND LEG OUTWARD. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: LOWER BACK \n\nSTEP 1: LIE PRONE ON THE FLOOR. RAISE YOURSELF UP SO THAT ONLY YOUR TOES AND FOREARMS ARE ON THE FLOOR. KEEP YOUR BACK STRAIGHT. LIFT YOUR RIGHT LEG UP. TOUCH YOUR HEEL. RETURN TO THE PLANK POSITION.
MUSCLE GROUP: LOWER BACK \n\nSTEP 1: LIE PRONE ON THE FLOOR. RAISE YOURSELF UP SO THAT ONLY YOUR TOES AND FOREARMS ARE ON BALANCE BALL. KEEP YOUR BACK STRAIGHT. HOLD FOR AS LONG AS POSSIBLE.

MUSCLE GROUP: LOWER BACK 

STEP 1: LIE WITH YOUR CHEST ON THE BALANCE BALL. KEEP YOUR ARMS BEHIND YOUR HEAD. 

STEP 2: RAISE YOUR UPPER BODY TOWARDS THE CEILING. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: PECTORALIS 

STEP 1 HOLD ONTO TWO DUMBBELLS WITH NEUTRAL GRIP. DISTANCE BETWEEN YOUR HANDS SHOULD BE SLIGHTLY WIDER THAN SHOULDER WIDTH APART. LIFT YOURSELF WITH YOUR ARMS SO THAT ONLY THE DUMBBELLS AND TOES ARE ON THE FLOOR. MAINTAIN A STRAIGHT BACK. HANDS POINT SLIGHTLY OUTWARD. 

STEP 2: LOWER YOURSELF UNTIL YOUR CHEST IS INCHES AWAY FROM THE FLOOR BY BENDING YOUR ELBOWS. THE ELBOWS SHOULD BEND TOWARDS YOUR FEET. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. 

STEP 3: RETURN TO STARTING POSITION. 

STEP 4: LIFT ONE DUMBBELL UP BY MOVING YOUR ELBOW UPWARD. YOUR HAND SHOULD MOVE IN A VERTICAL LINE. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. 

STEP 5: RETURN TO STARTING POSITION. 

STEP 6: LOWER YOURSELF UNTIL YOUR CHEST IS INCHES AWAY FROM THE FLOOR BY BENDING YOUR ELBOWS. THE ELBOWS SHOULD BEND TOWARDS YOUR FEET. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. 

STEP 7: RETURN TO STARTING POSITION 

STEP 8: LIFT THE OTHER DUMBBELL UP BY MOVING YOUR ELBOW UPWARD. YOUR HAND SHOULD MOVE IN A VERTICAL LINE. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: GLUTES 

STEP 1: LIE DOWN ON THE FLOOR WITH FEET POSITIONED ON THE STABILITY BALL. POSITION HANDS ON YOUR SIDES TO STABILIZE YOUR POSITION. 

STEP 2: LIFT YOUR HIP UPWARD. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: LATISSIMUS DORSI 

STEP 1: BEND YOUR KNEES SLIGHTLY. KEEP BACK BENT AND STRAIGHT. HOLD DUMBBELLS TO YOUR SIDE WITH NEUTRAL GRIP. 

STEP 2: RAISE THE DUMBBELLS VERTICALLY TOWARDS YOUR CHEST. REFRAIN FROM FLARING YOUR ELBOW OUT. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: LOWER BACK 

STEP 1: STAND STRAIGHT WITH FEET SHOULDER WIDTH APART. HOLD DUMBBELLS OF YOUR THIGHS WITH OVERHAND GRIP. LOWER YOURSELF UNTIL DUMBBELLS ARE AROUND SHIN LEVEL. KNEES BEND SLIGHTLY. KEEP CHEST STICKING OUTWARD AND YOUR BACK STRAIGHT. 

STEP 2: LIFT YOURSELF UP UNTIL YOUR ARE STANDING STRAIGHT. KEEP YOUR CHEST OUT. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.
MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS \n\nSTEP 1: LIE PRONE ON THE FLOOR. RAISE YOURSELF UP SO THAT ONLY YOUR TOES AND FOREARMS ARE ON THE FLOOR. KEEP YOUR BACK STRAIGHT. HOLD FOR AS LONG AS POSSIBLE.

MUSCLE GROUP: RECTUS ABDOMINIS \n\nSTEP 1: POSITION LEGS ON CHEER. WHILE KEEPING BACK STRAIGHT, PLACE FOREARMS ON THE FLOOR. YOUR FOREARMS ARE PERPENDICULAR WITH YOUR UPPER ARMS. HOLD FOR AS LONG AS YOU CAN.

MUSCLE GROUP: LATISSIMUS DORSI 

STEP 1: KNEEL WITH ONE LEG ON A FLAT BENCH AND PLACE ONE HAND ON THE BENCH FOR SUPPORT. PLACE OTHER LEG ON THE FLOOR AND HOLD DUMBBELL WITH A NEUTRAL GRIP. 

STEP 2: RAISE THE DUMBBELL VERTICALLY TOWARDS YOUR CHEST. REFRAIN FROM FLARING YOUR ELBOW OUT. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: LOWER BACK 

STEP 1: PLACE EZ CURL BAR ON THE FLOOR. POSITION YOURSELF SO THAT YOUR SHINS ARE AN INCH AWAY FROM THE BAR. STAND STRAIGHT WITH FEET SHOULDER WIDTH APART. WITHOUT MUCH HIP MOVEMENT, LOWER YOURSELF TO GRASP THE EZ CURL BAR WITH OVERHAND GRIP. BEND KNEES SLIGHTLY. STICK CHEST OUTWARD AND LOOK AHEAD. 

STEP 2: PULL EZ CURL BAR UP UNTIL YOU ARE STANDING STRAIGHT. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: HAMSTRINGS 

STEP 1: STAND STRAIGHT WITH FEET SHOULDER WIDTH APART. PLACE BARBELL ON THE BACK OF YOUR SHOULDERS. HOLD BARBELL WITH OVERHAND GRIP. DISTANCE BETWEEN YOUR HANDS SHOULD BE WIDER THAN SHOULDER WIDTH APART. ADJUST FEET TO POINT SLIGHTLY OUTWARD. 

STEP 2: KEEP BACK STRAIGHT AND BEND UPPER BODY UNTIL IT IS PARALLEL WITH THE GROUND. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: LATISSIMUS DORSI 

STEP 1: BEND YOUR KNEES SLIGHTLY. KEEP BACK BENT AND STRAIGHT. HOLD EZ CURL BAR UNDER YOU WITH SHOULDER WIDTH OVERHAND GRIP. 

STEP 2: RAISE THE EZ CURL BAR VERTICALLY TOWARDS YOUR CHEST. REFRAIN FROM FLARING YOUR ELBOWS OUT. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: LATISSIMUS DORSI 

STEP 1: BEND YOUR KNEES SLIGHTLY. KEEP BACK BENT AND STRAIGHT. HOLD EZ CURL BAR UNDER YOU WITH SHOULDER WIDTH OVERHAND GRIP. 

STEP 2: RAISE THE EZ CURL BAR VERTICALLY TOWARDS YOUR CHEST. REFRAIN FROM FLARING YOUR ELBOWS OUT. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: BICEBS BRACHII 

STEP 1: SIT ON THE STABILITY BALL. LET KETTLEBELLS HANG NEXT TO YOU WITH FIRM NEUTRAL GRIP. KEEP ARMS STRAIGHT. 

STEP 2: LIFT KETTLEBELLS UP WHILE KEEPING YOUR UPPER ARMS IN PLACE REFRAIN FROM USING YOUR SHOULDERS DURING THE MOVEMENT. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: BRACHIORADIALIS 

STEP 1: WHILE STANDING WITH BACK STRAIGHT, HOLD DUMBBELLS AT YOUR SIDES WITH NEUTRAL GRIP. KEEP ARMS STRAIGHT. 

STEP 2: LIFT DUMBBELLS UP WHILE KEEPING YOUR UPPER ARMS IN PLACE REFRAIN FROM USING YOUR SHOULDERS DURING THE MOVEMENT. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: BICEBS BRACHII 

STEP 1: STAND WITH FEET ABOUT HIP-WIDTH APART, ABS ENGAGED AS YOU HOLD MEDIUM HEAVY DUMBBELLS IN FRONT OF THE THIGHS. SQUEEZE THE BICEPS AND BEND THE ARMS, CURLING THE WEIGHTS UP TOWARDS THE SHOULDERS. 

STEP 2: KEEP THE ELBOWS STATIONARY AND ONLY BRING THE WEIGHT AS HIGH AS YOU CAN WITHOUT MOVING THE ELBOWS. SLOWLY LOWER THE WEIGHTS, KEEPING A SLIGHT BEND IN THE ELBOWS AT THE BOTTOM (E.G., DON'T LOCK THE JOINTS AND TRY TO KEEP TENSION ON)

STEP 2: LIFT DUMBBELL UP WHILE KEEPING YOUR UPPER ARM IN PLACE. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

STEP 2. RAISE YOUR LOWER BACK OFF THE FLOOR WHILE KEEPING YOUR EXTENDED LEG STRAIGHT. HOLD THEN RETURN TO YOUR ORIGINAL POSITION AFTER A FEW REPETITIONS, SWITCH LEGS AND REPEAT WITH THE OTHER SIDE.

MUSCLE GROUP: QUADRICEPS

STEP 3. HOLD FOR THREE SECONDS, THEN RETURN TO START AND REPEAT ON THE OTHER SIDE. THAT'S ONE REP.

MUSCLE GROUP: GLUTES, QUADRICEPS 

STEP 1: STAND STRAIGHT WITH FEET SHOULDER WIDTH APART. HOLD DUMBBELLS WITH NEUTRAL GRIP. DUMBBELLS ARE POSITIONED ON YOUR SHOULDERS. 

STEP 2: BEND KNEES SLIGHTLY. 

STEP 3: PUSH UP UNTIL YOUR ARMS ARE FULLY EXTENDED OVERHEAD. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: PECTORIALIS 

STEP 1: LIE DOWN CHEST FIRST WITH YOUR HANDS ON THE FLOOR. POSITION HANDS NEXT TO YOUR LOWER CHEST. DISTANCE BETWEEN YOUR HANDS SHOULD BE SLIGHTLY WIDER THAN SHOULDER WIDTH APART. LIFT YOURSELF WITH YOUR ARMS SO THAT ONLY YOUR HANDS AND TOES ARE ON THE FLOOR. MAINTAIN A STRAIGHT BACK. HANDS POINT SLIGHTLY OUTWARD. LIFT YOUR BEHIND UP IN THE AIR. ARMS SHOULD STRAIGHTEN OUT. 

STEP 2: PRETENDING THAT THERE IS AN IMAGINARY BAR TWO FEET FROM THE GROUND, GO UNDER THE BAR UNTIL YOUR ENTIRE UPPER BODY PASSED THE BAR. THE ELBOWS SHOULD BEND. ARMS STRAIGHTEN OUT AT THE END OF THE MOVEMENT. HOLD FOR ONE SECOND. RETURN TO STARTING POSITION.

MUSCLE GROUP: DELTOIDS

STEP 2. KEEPING YOUR ARMS PERFECTLY STRAIGHT, SLOWLY RAISE THE WEIGHTS OUT AND AP FRONT OF YOU UNTIL YOUR ARMS ARE PARALLEL TO THE FLOOR. 

STEP 3. HOLD FOR A SECOND, THEN SLOWLY LOWER THE WEIGHTS BACK DOWN.

MUSCLE GROUP: DELTOIDS 

STEP 1. SIT ON A SWISS-BALL WITH A LIGHT DUMBBELL IN EACH HAND. KEEP YOUR LEGS TOGETHER AND FEET FLAT ON THE FLOOR. YOUR HANDS SHOULD BE HANGING DOWN AT YOUR SIDES, WITH YOUR PALMS FACING BACK BEHIND YOU.

MUSCLE GROUP: DELTOIDS

STEP 1. STAND UPRIGHT AND HOLD A LIGHT DUMBBELL ON EITHER SIDE OF YOUR LOWER CHEST, WITH FOREARMS POINTING STRAIGHT DOWN AND UPPER ARMS OUT TO THE SIDES YET SLIGHTLY LOWER THAN PARALLEL TO THE FLOOR.

MUSCLE GROUP: DELTOIDS

MUSCLE GROUP: DELTOIDS

MUSCLE GROUP: DELTOIDS

MUSCLE GROUP: DELTOIDS

MUSCLE GROUP: DELTOIDS

MUSCLE GROUP: DELTOIDS

MUSCLE GROUP: LATISSIMUS 995G

GRAB THE BARBELL OFF THE FLOOR USING A FALSE OVERHAND GRIP (THUMBS SHOULD BE IN LINE WITH THE REST OF YOUR FINGERS) THAT'S SLIGHTLY WIDER THAN SHOULDER WIDTH. STEP 2. SLOWLY RETRACT YOUR SHOULDER BLADES AS TO HAVE THE BAR PULL UP TO THE POWER PART OF YOUR STERNUM. TRY NOT TO USE YOUR ARM MUSCLES, AND FOCUS ON GETTING THE MOST ACTIVITY OUT OF YOUR MIDDLE-BACK MUSCLES.

MUSCLE GROUP: PECTORALIS

STEP 2. PRESS THE DUMBBELL OVER YOUR HEAD SO THAT YOUR LEFT ARM IS STRAIGHT PALM POINTING OUT TO THE SIDE. REACH YOUR RIGHT ARM ACROSS YOUR FACE AND CUP YOUR LEFT ELBOW WITH YOUR RIGHT HAND THIS WILL HELP KEEP YOUR UPPER ARM STABLE AS YOU PERFORM THE EXERCISE. 

STEP 3. WITHOUT MOVING YOUR UPPER ARM, SLOWLY BEND YOUR LEFT ELBOW AND LOWER THE DUMBBELL BEHIND YOUR HEAD AS FAR AS POSSIBLE

MUSCLE GROUP: TRICEPS BRACHII

STEP 3. PAUSE IN THIS POSITION, THEN RETURN THE BAR TO THE STARTING POSITION BY STRAIGHTENING YOUR ARMS.

MUSCLE GROUP: TRICEPS BRACHII 

STEP 1. LIE ON A BENCH WITH YOUR KNEES BENT FARID FEET FLAT ON THE FLOOR. HOLD A FAIRLY LIGHT DUMBBELL IN YOUR LEFT HAND AND STRAIGHTEN THE ARM SO THAT THE WEIGHT IS ABOVE YOUR SHOULDER. USE YOUR RIGHT HAND TO REACH ACROSS YOUR CHEST AND UP THE UPPER PART OF YOUR LEFT ARM TO HELP STABILIZE IT.

Muscle Group: Triceps Brachii

Grilled Lemon Dijon Chicken Thighs with Arugula Salad

4 (4 oz.) skinless, boneless chicken thighs 

 tsp salt 

 tsp ground black pepper 

2.5 tbsp olive oil 

2 tsp lemon juice 

1 tsp minced garlic 

cooking spray 

1 tbsp balsamic vinegar 

1 tsp honey 

1 cup grape tomatoes, halved 

1 (5 oz.) package baby arugula

Sprinkle chicken with teaspoon salt and 1/8 teaspoon pepper. Combine chicken with 11.5 teaspoons oil, lemon juice, mustard, and garlic in a bowl, toss to coat. Let stand 4 minutes. Heat a grill pan over medium heat. Coat pan with cooking spray. Add chicken to pan, grill for 5 minutes on each side or until done. Cut chicken into inchthick slices. Enjoy!

1 cup flour 

vegetable oil 

salt 

freshly ground black pepper 

2 cloves garlic, minced 

 can chicken broth 

3 tbsp honey 

4 tbsp soy sauce 

2 tbsp lime juice 

2 cans broccoli, florets only 

2 cans of cooked white rice, for serving

In a large bowl, dredge chicken slightly in cornstarch. Transfer pieces to a large bowl filled with flour and toss slightly to coat again then set aside. Fill a large, deep skillet with vegetable oil over mediumhigh heat. Season the chicken, then drain and set aside. Add 2 tablespoons of cornstarch and stir to incorporate. To the sauce, add broccoli and carrots and cook until tender, for 5 minutes. Enjoy!

salt 

pepper

2 toasted bread slices 

1 small avocado 

1 tsp lime juice 

salt 

black pepper 

parsley

Prepare toast and fried eggs to personal preference. Peel and mash avocado with the lime juice, salt, and pepper. Spread avocado evenly on each slice of toast then top each with a fried egg and additional seasonings at your preference. Enjoy!

1 tbsp soy sauce 

1 tbsp honey 

2 chicken breasts, cut into pieces 

1 tbsp olive oil 

1 bunch asparagus, cut into pieces 

4 cloves garlic, thinly sliced 

2 tsp toasted sesame oil

In a zip lock bag, combine soy sauce and honey. Add chicken, and stir to coat. Set in the refrigerator until ready. Meanwhile, heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Remove the asparagus and set aside. Remove chicken from marinade, and add to skillet. Then add garlic, scallions, and the reserved marinade to the pan. Remove from heat and stir in sesame oil. Enjoy!

340 g / 3/4 lb. jumbo shrimp 

1 tbsp sesame oil 

2 tbsp honey 

1 tbsp garlic paste 

1 tbsp red chili pepper sauce 

½ juice lime
In a bag, mix all ingredients. Marinate for at least 20 minutes, then cook in a skillet. Enjoy!

1 lb. fresh asparagus 

2 tbsp olive oil 

3 tbsp grated parmesan 

2 garlic cloves, minced 

salt and pepper

Trim the asparagus bottoms. Lay the asparagus in the pan and season with salt and pepper and toss in the olive oil. Lay the asparagus on the grill in a row. Grill for 5–10 minutes over medium heat until they have char marks and are tender. Enjoy!
Grilled Lemon Dijon Chicken Thighs with Arugula Salad

4 (4 oz.) skinless, boneless chicken thighs 

½ tsp salt 

¼ tsp ground black pepper 

2.5 tbsp olive oil 

2 tsp lemon juice 

1 tsp minced garlic 

cooking spray 

1 tbsp balsamic vinegar 

1 tsp honey 

1 cup grape tomatoes, halved 

1 (5 oz.) package baby arugula

Sprinkle chicken with ¼ teaspoon salt and 1/8 teaspoon pepper. Combine chicken with 1–1.5 teaspoons oil, lemon juice, mustard, and garlic in a bowl, toss to coat. Let stand 4 minutes. Heat a grill pan over medium heat. Coat pan with cooking spray. Add chicken to pan, grill for 5 minutes on each side or until done. Cut chicken into ¼–inch–thick slices. Enjoy!

½ cup apple cider 

salt 

½ cup rolled oats 

2 tbsp milk 

2 tbsp chopped pecans

Bring cider, ¼ cup water, and salt to a boil, in a small saucepan over medium heat. Stir in oats. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Meanwhile, heat a dry skillet over medium heat, and toast the pecans, stirring. Remove pan with oatmeal from heat, stir in milk. Enjoy!
Egg White, Asparagus and Brown Rice & Quinoa Frittata

6 egg whites 

2 spears asparagus 

120 g brown rice & quinoa mix (cooked), 4.4 oz 

1 sweet mini red bell pepper 

garlic powder 

pepper 

salt 

½ pink grapefruit

Set oven to 410 degrees F/ 200C. Lightly spray a skillet with olive oil. Add cooked brown rice & quinoa to the skillet. Pour into egg whites. Add asparagus strips and bell pepper slices. Bake in the oven for about 15 minutes. Enjoy!
Spicy & Light Kung Pao Chicken Meal Prep

150 g / 0.3 lb. chicken breast 

1/6 clove garlic 

33 g / 1.17 oz snow peas 

150 g / 5.17 oz bell pepper 

2/3 tbsp water 

⅓ tbsp tomato sauce 

1/6 tbsp fresh ginger 

1/6 tbsp red chili pepper sauce 

1/6 tbsp rice vinegar 

chopped green onion

In a bowl, add ingredients for the sauce and whisk. Set a skillet over medium heat and spray with olive oil. When the skillet is hot, toss in garlic and sear for about 2 minutes. Then add chopped chicken breasts. Cook the chicken until the outside of it is seared, about 6 to 8 minutes. Toss in chopped bell peppers and sear for about 3 minutes. Slowly pour in the sauce and stir frequently. Enjoy!
Stir–Fried Beef with Broccoli and Bell Peppers

1 lb. flank steak, trimmed 

2 tbsp low–sodium soy sauce 

1 tsp minced garlic 

½ tsp ground black pepper 

¼ tsp crushed red pepper 

3/4 lb. broccoli 

2 tbsp canola oil 

1 large red bell pepper, cut into 1–inch pieces 

4 cups cooked long–grain rice

Cut steak in half. Cut each half across the grain into 1/8–inch–thick slices. Combine beef, soy sauce, garlic, and black pepper, toss well and refrigerate 30 minutes. Combine ½ tablespoons water, oyster sauce, and crushed red pepper in a small bowl set aside. Cut broccoli into florets, cut stems diagonally into ¼–inch–thick slices. Cook broccoli for 2 minutes. Enjoy!

4 ears corn 

1.5 cups sour cream 

1 cup grated parmesan 

1 lime, juice 

red chili powder 

2 limes cut into wedges, for garnish

Grill the corn turning once on a hot grill until it starts to get slightly charred. In a small bowl mix the mayonnaise, sour cream and cilantro. Squeeze over corn, lime juice and season with parmesan. Sprinkle with chili powder. Enjoy!

900 g whole leaved spinach 

1 cup cooking cream (8%) 

½ cup spelt/barley pearls (100 g) 

6–8 spring onions 

4 eggs 

2 oz grated parmesan (50 g) 

zest and juice from one lemon 

salt 

pepper

Preheat your oven to 400F /200C. Cook your grains as directed. Make sure your spinach is thawed. If not, steam it in a pot for about 10 min. Rinse the onions and chop them. Add spinach, lemon, cream, cheese, nutmeg, salt, and pepper, give it stir and season to taste. Place it in the oven for about 10 minutes until the egg whites are firm and the yolk is still soft. Enjoy!
Scrambled Eggs and Oatmeal with Banana and Cinnamon

2 eggs 

3 egg whites 

40 g / 2.8 oz instant oatmeal 

1 banana 

cinnamon

Whisk 2 eggs and 3 egg whites in a bowl. Season with a little salt and pepper. Add some oil to a pan and heat the pan on the stove. Add the eggs. Gently stir with a spatula until the eggs are cooked and then remove from the heat. Then prepare the instant oatmeal as directed. Stir thoroughly and add a little cinnamon for flavor. Enjoy!
Baked Avocado Egg with Lime Hollandaise

2 avocados 

4 small eggs 

dill, thyme, cilantro 

4 eggs yolks 

6 tbsp butter 

salt 

ground black pepper

Preheat oven to 425 F. Split avocados in half and remove the pit. Gently scoop out some of the pulp to make more room for an egg. Place avocado halves on a baking sheet, using the side of the pan to help hold them up and stabilize them. Crack an egg into each hole of the avocado. Bake for approximately 15 minutes or until whites are set and yolk is at desired consistency. Enjoy!

2 chicken breasts thinly cut, 3 oz each piece 

12 spears asparagus 

2 tbsp bbq sauce 1 pinch smoked paprika 

1 pinch garlic powder 

1 pinch pepper

Set oven to 400F / 200C. Flatten the chicken with a mallet. Season chicken cutlets with 1 tbsp barbecue sauce (for each piece) and your choice of seasonings. Place the chicken on a grill with the open facing down. Bake in the oven or smoke on a grill for about 8 to 10 minutes. Enjoy!

1 salmon fillet 

salt 

black pepper 

1 tsp oil 

4 tbsp sweet chili sauce 

1.5 tsp lime juice 

½ tsp white sesame

Season the salmon with salt & pepper. Mix the chili sauce, lime juice, sesame and cilantro leaves together. to combine well. Heat up a skillet over medium heat and add drizzle of oil. Pan–sear the salmon on both sides, until cooked. Enjoy!
Black Bean Salad with Lime–Cumin Dressing

1 cup thinly sliced celery 

3/4 cup sliced red onion 

2 (15 oz) cans of black beans, rinsed and drained 

¼ cup lime juice 

1 tbsp olive oil

For the salad, combine celery, onion, and black beans in a large bowl toss well. Combine all dressing ingredients in a small bowl, stir the mixture with a whisk until blended. Pour over bean mixture, tossing to coat. Enjoy!

4 chicken breasts 

¼ cup butter 

2 tbsp. olive oil 

1 lemon 

1 lemon sliced 

¼ cup white wine 

1 tsp salt 

1 tsp ground black pepper 

½ tsp paprika 

½ tsp dried parsley

Combine flour, salt, pepper, paprika, and parsley in a shallow bowl. Heat oil and butter over medium–high heat. Coat each chicken breast in the flour mixture and add to the hot skillet. Add lemon juice, white wine, lemon zest, and rosemary to the skillet. Cook chicken on each side until cooked. Enjoy!

29 g / 1 oz uncooked rolled oats (1 oz) 

120 ml unsweetened almond milk, 4.2 fl oz 

80 ml water, 2.8 fl oz 

⅓ green apple, chopped 

a tbsp cinnamon 

¼ tbsp maca powder 

1/6 tbsp vanilla extract

Place milk, water, and sugar in a saucepan. Add chopped apples to the milk mixture. Heat the mixture on medium until boiling. Add oats and cinnamon and cook for 3–5 minutes stirring occasionally. When oatmeal is cooked, add vanilla extract. Enjoy!

1 egg 

4 egg whites 

85 g / 3 oz lean ground turkey, cooked 

1 handful spinach (raw) 

58 g / 2.1 oz bell pepper 

8 g / 1 oz goat cheese

Season and cook a lean ground turkey in skillet. Measure a daily portion of eggs and cook in a separate skillet. Add goat cheese, spinach, bell peppers and ground turkey. Wait for it to cool a little while before and wrap it in aluminum foil instead. Enjoy!

110 g chicken breasts, 4 oz 

40 g pineapple, 1.4 oz 

120 g brown rice, 4.4 oz 

⅓ tbsp olive oil 

½ tsp brown mustard 

1/6 tbsp smoked paprika 

sea salt 

pepper

Chop the raw chicken breasts into small pieces. Season the chicken pieces with smoked paprika and brown mustard. Add olive oil to a skillet then toss in the chicken breast pieces. Cook for about 4 minutes until the chicken is about 80% finished, then add chopped bell pepper. Cook for another 2 or 3 minutes before adding the diced pineapple. Enjoy!
Light Lemon Garlic Pasta With Salmon

1 lb. salmon fillet 

16 oz rigatoni/pasta 

1 tsp garlic, minced 

2 tbsp olive oil 

½ cup basil leaves, chopped 

salt and pepper 

2 tbsp lemon juice

Cook the pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, season salmon with salt and pepper and bake at 350 degrees F for 15–20 minutes, depending on thickness. Once the pasta is cooked, drain and toss with garlic, olive oil, basil and season. Add lemon juice, zest, and capers to the pasta and toss to mix. Enjoy!

water

salt 

pepper

1 cup water 

1 sliced banana

1 tsp ground cinnamon
Combine oats and 1 cup of water in a small microwave bowl. Microwave on high temperature for 3 minutes. Top with banana slices, walnuts, and cinnamon. Enjoy!

½ cup chopped shallots

1 (8 oz) package sliced white mushrooms

salt 

ground black pepper 

8 large eggs

2 cups broccoli florets

salt and pepper

450 g / 1 lb. jumbo shrimp

salt 

pepper 

fresh parsley 

lemon 

25 g / 3.6 oz coffee beans

salt & pepper

1 sweet potato, raw,

fresh rosemary 

salt 

pepper

First, pour the egg white in the hole, then add the egg yolk. Enjoy!

3 cups water 

2 cups rolled oats 

3 tbsp ground flaxseed 

1/8 tsp salt 

¼ cup whole milk 

1 cup blueberries 

1 tbsp blueberry preserves 

½ tsp grated lemon rind 

1 tbsp lemon juice

Bring 3 cups of water to a boil. Stir in oats, add the flaxseed, and salt. Reduce heat to medium–low, cook until tender, stirring frequently. Stir in milk and butter. Meanwhile, combine blueberries and next 4 ingredients in a microwave bowl, microwave at high for 1.5 minutes, stirring every 30 seconds. Divide oatmeal among 4 bowls. Top with blueberries and pecans. 4 chicken breasts, cubed 

1 cup flour 

vegetable oil 

salt 

freshly ground black pepper 

2 cloves garlic, minced

2 cans broccoli, florets only

To the sauce, add broccoli and carrots and cook until tender, for 5 minutes. Enjoy!

salt and pepper

If you would rather juice the ingredients to make it even smoother, go right ahead to keep all the fiber and nutrients in but juicing the ingredients is just as good. Enjoy!

2 tbsp olive oil

Place a saut pan over medium heat and add oil. Add shrimp, peppers, leek, capers, garlic, salt and pepper and cook for 4 minutes until shrimp is pink. Remove from heat. Add lemon juice, scraping the bottom of the pan with a spoon. Serve shrimp sprinkled with fresh parsley and basil. Enjoy!
